title: El Malpais National Monument: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners            Partners        Bureau of Land Management  The El Malpais Conservation Area, operated by the Bureau of Land Management (BLM), borders El Malpais National Monument and partners with the National Park Service (NPS) in operating and staffing the Northwest New Mexico Visitor Center.  Western National Parks Association Offering a wide selection of educational products for visitors, Western National Parks Association (WNPA) operates bookstores at the Northwest New Mexico Visitor Center and the El Malpais Information Center. WNPA has been a charitable non-profit cooperating association of the National Park Service (NPS) since 1938. As a park partner, WNPA supports parks across the West by developing products, services, and programs to help discover, capture, and share park stories to enrich the visitor's experience.
